/** * Example showing how to create a drawing and displaying it in an editor * with a "delegation selection tool". * We don't make use of a toolbar, so users are not able to add new figure * to the drawing, they can just play around with the figures that are there. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 1.0 November 9, 2006 Created. */
